frontmatter.title: Replacing HashMap with Off-Heap HashMap in Java?
frontmatter.description: Implementing a simple read only HashMap stored off-heap in Java and benchmarking it against java.util.HashMap!

frontmatter.title: Replacing HashSet with Sorted Array and Binary Search in Java?
frontmatter.description: An attempt to replace HashSet with sorted array and binary search for memory optimization. Including off-heap storage.
